ABOUT.title: About Me
ABOUT.subtitle: Get to Know
ABOUT.aboutMeDesc1: I was born in 1995 in Sinop. After completing my master's degree and military service, I started focusing on software development, a field I've been passionate about since childhood and believe will shape the future.
ABOUT.aboutMeDesc2: More than two years, I have been improving my skills in front-end development. I have experience with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Next.js, Redux, TypeScript, REST API, Tailwind CSS, Material UI, Ant Design, and Dev Extreme. I have worked on projects like the BSH Milkrun Project and the COSMOS Modernization Project under NTT DATA Business Solutions, and I am currently a Frontend Developer on a project supporting Environmental, Social, and Governance (ESG) initiatives.
ABOUT.aboutMeDesc3: You can check out the details of the projects I’ve worked on in the Experience section below. I also share the projects I develop to improve my skills on GitHub, and you can check out some of them in the Projects section below.

nttData1.desc1: The Logistics project mainly focuses on order management, GPS tracking and a notification system.
nttData1.desc2: Developed a web application for managing and tracking logistics, improving operational efficiency for the company.
nttData1.desc3: Engaged in business requirements analysis to ensure the project met company objectives and user expectations.
nttData1.desc4: Technologies utilized include React JS, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Dev Extreme, and Bootstrap

nttData2.desc1: The Modernization project is dedicated to updating a global application for our client, with a particular focus on managing the technical service processes for home appliances.
nttData2.desc2: Backend API integrations were implemented within the project, and user interfaces were designed to enhance functionality and improve the user experience.
nttData2.desc3: Technologies utilized include HTML, CSS, TypeScript, React JS, Redux Toolkit, Material UI, and Dev Extreme.

nttData3.desc1: As a frontend developer at BTS ESG, I contributed to a web application that focuses on environmental, social, and governance (ESG) aspects
nttData3.desc2: The project involves form creation, submission handling, and response collection.
nttData3.desc3: Technologies utilized include HTML, CSS, TypeScript, React JS, Redux Toolkit, Material UI, and Dev Extreme
